resources.string:
The trip includes everything you can imagine.

 All items per person can be found described below:


DRINKS

 - Tequila 1800 Reposado
 - Gyn Bombay


FOOD

 - Professional Cook


TRANSPORTATION
 - Shuttle to and from House
 - Transport to and from parties


SERVICES
 - Full time cleaning
 - Party tickets (if available)


You won`t have to worry about anything, just leave it to us.
 Enjoy!
